data.title: Mtianeti DMI
data.meta_description:
Museum address: Dusheti Municipality, Village Chargali
Date of establishment of the museum: 1961
The legal status of the museum: Since 2008 Legal Entity under Public Law (LEPL) Unified Ministry of Culture and Monuments Protection of Georgia
Museum type (profile): Memorial
Quantity of stored items: 1143

Museum collection description: The museum houses memorial objects connected with life and work of well-known Georgian poet Vazha-Pshavela (1861-1915), ethnographic collection (XIX c. and beginning of the XX c.), various publications of poet’s works, also are presented paintings, graphic and sculptures, photographs dedicated to the poet. Museum’s branch: Korsha Ethnographical Museum.

Working hours: Every day, except Monday, 10.00 – 18.00
Ticket price:  1 GEL.
Free admission: Children up to the age of 6; Georgian and Foreign Museum staff, ICOM members (cardholders with ID), people with disabilities (upon presentation of valid ID), refugees.

Exhibitions: thematic exhibitions for schools concerning the festival “Vazhaoba”
Educational programmes: Different programmes dedicated to Vazha-Pshavela

Tel: +995 558 257 190
Email: mananagoderdzauli@gmail.com
data.text:
Museum address: Dusheti Municipality, Village Chargali

Date of establishment of the museum: 1961

The legal status of the museum: Since 2008 Legal Entity under Public Law (LEPL) Unified Ministry of Culture and Monuments Protection of Georgia

Museum type (profile): Memorial

Quantity of stored items: 1143

Museum collection description: The museum houses memorial objects connected with life and work of well-known Georgian poet Vazha-Pshavela (1861-1915), ethnographic collection (XIX c. and beginning of the XX c.), various publications of poet’s works, also are presented paintings, graphic and sculptures, photographs dedicated to the poet. Museum’s branch: Korsha Ethnographical Museum.

Working hours: Every day, except Monday, 10.00 – 18.00

Ticket price: 1 GEL.

Free admission: Children up to the age of 6; Georgian and Foreign Museum staff, ICOM members (cardholders with ID), people with disabilities (upon presentation of valid ID), refugees.

Exhibitions: thematic exhibitions for schools concerning the festival “Vazhaoba”

Educational programmes: Different programmes dedicated to Vazha-Pshavela
